cards.name: Assassin
cards.description: Move two squares in line or diagonal.

special_actions.name: Assassination
special_actions.description: Allow you to move back another player.

cards.name: Bishop
cards.description: Move two squares in diagonal. Can move on two different colors.

cards.name: Queen
cards.description: Move two squares in line or diagonal.

cards.name: Wizard
cards.description: Move one squares in line or diagonal. Can move on a square of any color.

trumps.name: Blizzard
trumps.description: Reduce the number of cards a player can play by 1.

trumps.name: Fortress
trumps.description: Prevent the player to move on some colors.

trumps.name: Ram
trumps.description: Destroy towers and reduce duration for fortress

trumps.name: Reinforcements
trumps.description: Allow the player to play one more move.

trumps.name: Tower
trumps.description: Prevent the player to move on some colors.

arline.name: Night mist
arline.description: Disappear from the board and cannot be targeted by other players.

djor.name: Impassable
djor.description: Your tower and fortress cannot be destroyed.

garez.name: Inveterate Ride
garez.description: Your knights can move on any colors

mirindrel.name: Terraforming
mirindrel.description: Change the color of a square

razbrak.name: Force of nature
razbrak.description: Towers and fortresses have no effect.

ulya.name: Domination
ulya.description: Make queens move of 3 squares instead of 2.

luni.name: Secret blade
luni.description: Add the assassination special action to Warrior cards.

special_actions.name: Assassination
special_actions.description: Allow you to move back another player.

kharliass.name: Metamorphosis
kharliass.description: Stole the power of one of your opponent
